author: mbrohl
msg: Manually applied and modified the changes of the patch from jira issue OFBIZ-6312: Catalog Manager's EditProduct screen HTML should place a limit on the size of text that can be entered in the Product Description box.
Introduces a new maxlength attribute to the textarea element in forms, applies the maxlength (255 chars) value in several FTL files, when the DB is limiting the length.
Thanks Forrest Rae for reporting the issue and providing the patch.

author: pottlinger
msg: RAT-202: Replace manual creation of temporary files with junit Rule.
* Add constants for XML report elements/attributes.
